ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...
ygData.msgSnippet: Tani, Not to worry.  The only evil vile nasty twinks are the ones who throw hundreds of plat at inexpensive items just because they can afford them. This
ygData.messageBody:
Tani,

Not to worry. The only "evil vile nasty" twinks are the ones who throw
hundreds of plat at inexpensive items just because they can afford them.
This ruins the economy and causes "real" bards to have to pay exorbitant
prices for those same items because 50's are blowing hundreds on something
worth tens.

If you camped it, you earned it. If you payed 10x market value for it...
then that's the "Bad" twink.

So, hold your head up with pride ;) You earned your Shard :)

~ L
----- Original Message -----
From: "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, March 27, 2000 4:42 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...


> From: "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
>
> Um well, ya see......
> Tani is an evil, vile, twink, so well, I didn't pay for it. Just camped
it
> with my Shaman..
>
> *hangs her head in shame*
>
> But she's really a very nice Shaman....
>
> Tani/Halana
> Solusek Ro
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Sigma111 [mailto:sigma7@...]
> Sent: Monday, March 27, 2000 2:38 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...
>
>
> From: "Sigma111" <sigma7@...>
>
> How much was the shard, if I may ask?
>
> I see them go for 1000p sometimes, but mabey that is just
> a fluke?
>
> Probably not though...:|
>
>
>
> > From: "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
> >
> > Yeah, I just got my obsidian shart, and like wow, that proc makes a very
> > satisfying BOOM!
> >
> > Tani, 21st (wow, I die a LOT in Mistmoore) Bard
> > Halana, 50th (no matter what people say, loot matters to them) Shaman
> > Solusek Ro
> >
> > P.S. Macgrough, Halana has your gloves all ready :) just let me know
when
> > you're on
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
> > Sent: Friday, March 24, 2000 9:15 AM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...
> >
> >
> > From: "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...>
> >
> > Bards can't use 2hslash... well we can, but our skill is capped at 1 ;)
> >
> > What you need to do is get a 1hb a pierce and a 1hs weapon. Keep all 3
> > skills maxxed ;)
> >
> > 1HB: One of the best bard weapons in the game (till much higher levels)
> is
> > the Staff of Writhing. 9dmg 33dly and a 48dmg proc that also interrupts
> > spell casters. The staff starts proc'ing at level 28. The only real
> > drawback to this weapon is the -9 charisma hit. But once your charisma
is
> > up in the 130 range you really won't notice the penalty that much and
the
> > staff is more than worth it if you are using melee combat. Another good
> 1hb
> > is the BEM (Black Enamelled Mace) I believe it's 8dmg 28dly
> >
> > 1HS: Uhh tons of good stuff
> > Pierce: Some of the nicer ones are the Dragoon Dirk and the Obsidian
> shard.
> > There are others as well.
> >
> > That way you can use whatever weapon comes along ;)
> >
> > Lyrnia Jongleur
> > Bard of Norrath
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: "Sigma111" <sigma7@...>
> > To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Friday, March 24, 2000 10:43 AM
> > Subject: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...
> >
> >

> > >
> > >
> > > Ok, for those who missed the last post, I am a level 7, almost 8 bard.
> > > Right now I am using a regular Long Sword. Not too dramatic..:)
> > >
> > > I know I get dual wield at 17, and that sounds nice but I was
wondering
> > > what it maxes out at and if its better to get dual wield for 2 1h
> slashers
> > > or to invest in a 2h slasher like a bibs?
> > >
> > > thanks!
> > >
> > > Cerulia
> > > Bard of 7.8 songs, Fennin Ro
> > >
